Image classification using convolutional neural networks

12 May 2017, Friday

The convolutional neural networks (CNN) was implemented using tensorflow for image classfication. The code was executed in a parallel fashion and the parameters were tunned for optimization. Further modification can be used to improve the performance. The same algorithm is scalable for other classification problem. »

Train a self-driving car using reinforcement learning

05 May 2017, Friday

The reinforcement learning technique was applied for a self-driving agent in a simplified world to aid it in effectively reaching its destinations in the allotted time. »

Cluster analysis of business using unsupervised learning

21 April 2017, Friday

I have applied unsupervised learning techniques on product spending data collected for customers of a wholesale distributor in Lisbon, Portugal to identify customer segments hidden in the data. »

Model and feature selection using supervised learning

28 March 2017, Tuesday

I have implemented K-nearest neighbors (KNN), Gaussian Naive Bayes, and Adaboosting methond using supervised learning techniques on data collected for the U.S. census to help CharityML (a fictitious charity organization) identify people most likely to donate to their cause. »

Model evaluation and validation on house price prediction

07 March 2017, Tuesday

I have evaluated the performance and predictive power of a model that has been trained and tested on data collected from homes in suburbs of Boston, MA. »
